text: ( Source : Bundesverfassungsgericht ) Press Release No. 73 / 2015 of 09 October 2015 Order of 06 October 2015 1 BvR 1571/15, 1 BvR 1588/15, 1 BvR 1582/15 In an order published today, the First Senate of the Federal Constitutional Court has
